participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is energetic and expressive, with a passion for music and games. She enjoys being creative and is always on the lookout for new experiences.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

participant_2.name: Arjun
participant_2.personality: Arjun is introspective and dedicated, with a strong focus on his work as a swim coach. He values tradition but also enjoys exploring different perspectives.
participant_2.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india.

content.text: hello, how are you? I just got back from a video games. I love it
do you have any hobbies? I like listening to band music and video games
